description: This file defines a React custom hook called useNotes, which manages a collection of notes with features such as creation, updating, deletion, undo delete, pinning, persistence (loading and saving to storage), and ordering. It handles internal state management and side effects related to notes in a note-taking application.

methods.name: useNotes()
methods.description: Main hook managing notes, providing functions to create, update, delete, undo delete, pin, unpin, and force save notes. It also exposes internal state properties such as the notes collection, order, and last opened note.
